<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fade Band](/Equipment.aspx?ID=210)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 566 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 320 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** An attack misses you

**Requirement** You are a master in Stealth
</row>

</column>

---

This thin, silvery wire wraps around your armor. When you activate the band, it casts a 2nd-level [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) spell on you.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
